title: Rottingraisins' SCP Comics & Artwork
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:black-highlighter-theme]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:toggle-sidebar-bhl]]
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

+++ Captain's Log, 06/26/24
I got back into the SCP Foundation during the second Covid lockdown in 2021, years having passed since my first bout of obsession with it in my early teens. I thought my interest in it would be brief, something to pass the time until I'd be able to occupy myself otherwise again, but three years and [https://rottingraisins.tumblr.com/tagged/scp several hundred pieces] of ambitious and less ambitious fanart later, here I am, woefully not yet free.

In order to have something to show for it, here's a gallery of every piece I've made for or directly based on something on the wiki, starting circa mid 2023. I'll try my best to update it as I go.

Feel free to peruse at your leisure. I'll see you around!

@@ @@
------
@@ @@

[[div style="text-align: left; width: 80%; padding-left: 10%"]]
+++ Comics
meaning my own original stories (as much as anything SCP can really be called 'original'). More to come, hopefully. In chronological order of posting.
[[/div]]

@@ @@

= [[image https://i.imgur.com/ukeLOas.jpg width="300px" link="https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/art:the-king-has-died"]]
[[div style="text-align: center"]]
**[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/art:the-king-has-died The king has died]**
"Kid, listen. Shit isn't //fair// here."
[[/div]]

@@ @@

= [[image https://i.imgur.com/Gaw6md9.png width="300px" link="https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/art:they-thought-he-was-your-boyfriend"]]
[[div style="text-align: center"]]
**[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/art:they-thought-he-was-your-boyfriend They thought he was your boyfriend]**
"Can I tell you a secret, too?"
[[/div]]

@@ @@
------
@@ @@

[[div style="text-align: left; width: 80%; padding-left: 10%"]]
+++ Fanart
meaning Illustrations directly based on other community members' work. Sorted by series/canon, as I'm a tale reader at heart.

[[collapsible show="Devil's Advocate: Voices Carry" hide="-"]]
= [[image https://64.media.tumblr.com/4fba9b814dbf3f593e31af98f04b8741/5182bea2cd86a10c-c5/s1280x1920/79a085d8a6a4c86c5cde1e27dd7c527969c39e12.pnj width="500px"]]
[[div style="text-align: center; width: 80%; padding-left: 10%"]]
"You know," Anne said, "I could think of a lot of things I think you are, but I don't think you're a coward."
**[[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/voices-carry-part-1 |Voices Carry]]]** by [[*user Glassautomaton]]
[[/div]]
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="Eventyr: Agents Adams and Strelnikov*" hide="-"]]
= [[image https://i.imgur.com/oHjhzkg.jpeg width="500px"]]
[[div style="text-align: center; width: 80%; padding-left: 10%"]]
**[[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/eventyr-hub |The Eventyr Canon]]]** by various authors
[[/div]]
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="Eventyr: To Serve Deer*" hide="-"]]
= [[image https://i.imgur.com/SuFxUpc.png width="500px"]]
[[div style="text-align: center; width: 80%; padding-left: 10%"]]
"Ms. Thompson, I'm saying it would be an //honor// to eat your girlfriend."
**[[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/to-serve-deer |To Serve Deer]]]** by [[*user Prismal]] and [[*user AstersQuill]]
[[/div]]
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="Monarchs & Maestros: SCP-7408" hide="-"]]
= [[image https://64.media.tumblr.com/74d2638d52951de4a11e418462f50dc5/c60409eeb6c33efc-a8/s1280x1920/6dac10bc3064871e63d883dc1baf80a6958c1e46.pnj width="500px"]]
[[div style="text-align: center; width: 80%; padding-left: 10%"]]
It fucks me up, thinking about what happens to caterpillars. It's sort of like dying, isn't it? Getting your whole body dissolved, even if it gets reconstituted later.
**[[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-7408 |SCP-7408]]] "Metamorphosis"** by [[*user montagueetc]]
[[/div]]
[[/collapsible]]


[[collapsible show="Resurrection: Yesterday" hide="-"]]
= [[image https://64.media.tumblr.com/a7f6380e70c7dbee462f95794304c4a3/031dc4043dd48b08-e0/s2048x3072/dce1ab6702a91415f7353501ff48625b4035c148.jpg width="500px"]]
[[div style="text-align: center; width: 80%; padding-left: 10%"]]
Clef grinned. "God. It's perfect," he said. "The last girl always kills the monster at the end."
**[[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/yesterday |Yesterday]]]** by [[*user thedeadlymoose]]
[[/div]]
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="The Cool War" hide="-"]]
[[=image https://i.imgur.com/JIiTU6O.png width="500px"]]
[[div style="text-align: center; width: 80%; padding-left: 10%"]]
"You want to know why we aren’t cool yet? It’s because ‘we’ includes all of us, and sadly, you are one of us. And you just aren’t cool.” Ruiz smiled into the Betamax recorder. “//Yet.//”
**[[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/a-cooler-manifesto |A Cooler Manifesto]]]** by [[*user Randomini]]
[[/div]]
[[/collapsible]]


[[collapsible show="The Eternal MxTape: The Not-Too-Distant Future" hide="-"]]
= [[image https://64.media.tumblr.com/9cf8039daf63e0ebd7033bb87a219863/bf01bde3db363089-dc/s1280x1920/94c2d5055c207cafece9b3f2847c3d6a45f136cf.pnj width="500px"]]
[[div style="text-align: center; width: 80%; padding-left: 10%"]]
"Where the hell am I?" They paused. "//When// am I?" Another moment of hesitation. "You wear glasses, Penelope?"
**[[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/the-not-too-distant-future |The Not-Too-Distant Future]]]** by [[*user Tsercele]]
[[/div]]
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="There Is No Antimemetics Division" hide="-"]]
[[=image https://i.imgur.com/wdmhXP1.jpeg width="500px"]]
[[div style="text-align: center; width: 80%; padding-left: 10%"]]
"I can tell that there is some kind of war going on back here. And you're losing people to it. And you're almost at the end. And you're going to win."
**[[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/where-have-you-been-all-my-life|Where Have You Been All My Life]]]** by [[*user qntm]]
[[/div]]
[[/collapsible]]

 * created for 🇵🇸 [https://www.tumblr.com/scp4palestine SCP4Palestine]
